have a lot of these like black box machine learning methods that you just call you just give it the data you get
some results back you use them in a production system but in this case the
data looked fine and some of these things they were not spotted even by the people who are conducting the survey so
if you are using any kind of machine learning as a service it's important to
actually look at the data and I think my main point is that with machine learning
you can do quite a lot of very cool things but you still have to think and
my favorite metaphor about machine learning and data science is that all
the cool models and running all the cool like I know NLP deep learning etc that's
just tip of the iceberg but most of the work is actually in data cleaning and
data processing and quite often you should do even more because the data are never as clean as you assume they are my

wrangling and 10% complaining about data wrangling so this stuff is very very
annoying but I hope we saw that it's really important because in this case that was the salary information and the

I could have assumed that okay well maybe this country just has big tradition of unpaid internships and
something like that and that's the cause so it's quite hard to spot these things
but it's very important to do that so I hope you saw that just screaming
